data.what_is:
Touchdown provides a modern, intuitive marketing suite natively integrated with Microsoft Dynamics 365, Power Platform and Business Central.

Develop marketing automation strategies, professional landing pages, integrated forms, scoring and behavioral filters. Manage your events from start to finish and analyze your statistics to improve your productivity.

Touchdown helps you improve your business processes and make the most of your rich data. Whether you're building an effective customer journey, implementing personalized scoring, a lead nurturing strategy or marketing automation tailored to meet your needs, Touchdown is the essential tool to help you improve your sales and marketing strategy.
data.product_description:
Touchdown provides a modern, intuitive marketing suite natively integrated with Microsoft Dynamics 365, Power Platform and Business Central.

Develop marketing automation strategies, professional landing pages, integrated forms, scoring and behavioral filters. Manage your events from start to finish and analyze your statistics to improve your productivity.

Touchdown helps you improve your business processes and make the most of your rich data. Whether you're building an effective customer journey, implementing personalized scoring, a lead nurturing strategy or marketing automation tailored to meet your needs, Touchdown is the essential tool to help you improve your sales and marketing strategy.

pricing_plans.plan_description:
TAKE CONTROLE OF YOUR DATA.
Share a 360deg vision of your prospects and customers, make effective decisions and interact simply by e-mail.
plan_features: Email campaigns with multiple delivery methods
Track marketing activity within contact records
Management of unsubscribers, duplicates and NPAIs

pricing_plans.plan_description: GAIN IN EFFICENCY. Automate your multi-channel actions and create personalized customer journeys to optimize your conversion.
plan_features: Support by e-mail, chat and telephone

pricing_plans.plan_description:
TRANSFORM YOUR BUSINESS.
Align your Marketing & Sales departments, leverage your prospecting power and exceed your targets.
plan_features: Promotional, follow-up and thank-you scenarios - Event

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Touchdown?
It cares for the privacy of the customer and integrate well with Microsoft 365 to help increase the growth of the business

What do you dislike about Touchdown?
The overall usage of touchdown provides a very good experience with very little to complain for the services

What problems is Touchdown solving and how is that benefiting you?
It helps in increasing the brand visibility by giving compelling solutions to the problem which are hindering the growth
